<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to hoist an AGPR to VGPR copy across a PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should allow folding of an AGPR into a consumer which may support it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example 1: LCSSA PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:vreg = COPY %0:areg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      exit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:vreg = PHI %1:vreg, %loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      exit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:areg = PHI %0:areg, %loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:vreg = COPY %1:areg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example 2: PHI with multiple incoming values:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      entry:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:vreg = GLOBAL&#95;LOAD(..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:vreg = PHI %1:vreg, %entry, %5:vreg, %loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %3:areg = COPY %2:vreg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %4:areg = (instr using %3:areg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %5:vreg = COPY %4:areg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      entry:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:vreg = GLOBAL&#95;LOAD(..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:areg = COPY %1:vreg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %3:areg = PHI %2:areg, %entry, %X:areg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %4:areg = (instr using %3:areg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a17772fd1beeccd740ec6412abad098f9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a17772fd1beeccd740ec6412abad098f9">SIFoldOperandsImpl::tryFoldPhiAGPR</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>.isPHI());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tryFoldPhiAGPR will aggressively try to create AGPR PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For GFX90A and later, this is pretty much always a good thing, but for GFX908</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there&#39;s cases where it can create a lot more AGPR-AGPR copies, which are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expensive on this architecture due to the lack of V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;MOV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function looks at all AGPR PHIs in a basic block and collects their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operands. Then, it checks for register that are used more than once across</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all PHIs and caches them in a VGPR. This prevents ExpandPostRAPseudo from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// having to create one VGPR temporary per use, which can get very messy if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these PHIs come from a broken-up large PHI (e.g. 32 AGPR phis, one per vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// element).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      a:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %in:agpr&#95;256 = COPY %foo:vgpr&#95;256</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      c:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %x:agpr&#95;32 = ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      b:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %0:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %x, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %y, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %z, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      a:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %in:agpr&#95;256 = COPY %foo:vgpr&#95;256</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %tmp:vgpr&#95;32 = V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;READ&#95;B32&#95;e64 %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %tmp&#95;agpr:agpr&#95;32 = COPY %tmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      c:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %x:agpr&#95;32 = ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      b:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %0:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %x, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %1:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %y, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        %2:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %z, %c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a8562a883d9494266aca5d1b2f8b5dc5e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a8562a883d9494266aca5d1b2f8b5dc5e">SIFoldOperandsImpl::tryOptimizeAGPRPhis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is only really needed on GFX908 where AGPR-AGPR copies are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unreasonably difficult.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a7a1e046b8ad8a2f498a2c1fadbbe1edc">ST</a>-&gt;hasGFX90AInsts())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at all AGPR Phis and collect the register + subregister used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, unsigned&gt;</a>, std::vector&lt;MachineOperand &#42;&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegToMO;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a6917282da348ebaf7919a7c0e66b1c93">TRI</a>-&gt;isAGPR(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#ac84cecb52ca09605285ef50620fdeb02">MRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> K = 1; K &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands(); K += 2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
